task.title: Disassembling the Rear Axle and Differential
task.shortdesc: Remove and disassemble the rear axle and differential components in the correct sequence for maintenance.

taskbody.prereq: Ensure the universal joint is disconnected before beginning.

step.info: Remove the bolt from the front end of the radius rods
Remove cap screws securing the drive shaft tube to rear axle housing

substep.cmd: Remove the rear axle housing cap
Remove bolts connecting differential housing halves

taskbody.result: The differential will be fully disassembled for maintenance or repair.

ul.li: Reassemble all parts in their exact original positions
Use new paper liners during reassembly
